title: Easy fish stew with rice
ingredients: ['475ml water', '180g uncooked long-grain rice', '450g cod fillets', '1 1/2 (400g) tins whole plum tomatoes, with liquid', '2 teaspoons dried minced onion', '1 teaspoon chicken stock granules', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano', '1/4 teaspoon garlic granules', '1/8 teaspoon hot sauce']
